title: Installation issue: opencv+gtk
body:
Error wile compile opencv with gtk2.
Everything compile ok,  but gtk on opencv not working.

---
```console
$ spack install -v opencv+gtk+highgui+imgproc
```
from compile log, after cmake config
General configuration for OpenCV 3.4.3 =====================================
...
GUI:
is empty!
features with gui not working

to remove error changed package.py of opencv:

elif '^gtkplus@2:3' in spec:
            args.extend([
                '-DWITH_GTK:BOOL=**ON**',
                '-DWITH_GTK_2_X:BOOL=ON'
            ])

Problem reproduced on linux mint + gentoo

After this modification on linux mint:
from cmake config:
--   GUI: 
--     GTK+:                        YES (ver 2.24.32)
--       GThread :                  YES (ver 2.56.2)
--       GtkGlExt:                  NO

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux strcom-w 4.9.0-7-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.9.110-1 (2018-07-05) x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    LMDE 3 Cindy
``` 

- `packages.yaml`
cat ~/.spack/packages.yaml
packages:
  hdf5:
    variants: -mpi +hl

  caffe:
    variants: -cuda -leveldb -lmdb -matlab -opencv -python

  opencv:
    variants: -dnn -calib3d -features2d -flann -highgui -java -ml -python -stitching \
        -superres -ts -videostub -cuda -eigen -ipp -ipp_iw -jasper +jpeg -opencl \
        -opencl_svm -openclamdfft -openclamdblas -openmp +png -qt -gtk -iff -vtk -zlib

  python:
    variants: -dbm -pythoncmd -tk -ucs4

  atk:
    version: ['2.20.0']

  gtkplus:
    version: ['2.24.32']
